website_summaries.verdict: These box-style shopping bags are fully insulated to keep groceries as fresh as possible. Ideal for longer commutes or days when you need to run other errands after picking up the groceries.
pros: Insulated inner layer helps keep contents cold or warm
Sturdy sides stay upright for easy packing
Tough and durable with reinforced handles and dual zippers
Doubles as a picnic basket or lunch tote
Can be wiped down or hand washed for cleaning
cons: Could use a sturdier base to prevent sagging

website_summaries.verdict: Affordable, sturdy insulated bags that keep foods hot or cold and hold a lot of food.
pros: Includes 2 bags that each measure 16 x 13 x 9 inches and hold up to 25 pounds
The bags stand upright on their own and each have 2 good quality zippers
Sturdy handles won't break and the bags insulate well
cons: These aren't as thick as some other insulated bags

customer_reviews.title: I work for instacart Uber eats door dash and caviar these bags work great ...
customer_reviews.text: I work for instacart Uber eats door dash and caviar these bags work great to transport food on long routes
customer_reviews.author: Tasheema F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...add some Velcro, even better!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than the hodgepodge of bags I have been using for several years. The size is perfect and one reason I bought these is that they stand up on their own. The maiden voyage was yesterday and the young woman bagging my groceries was very impressed. UPDATE: After using these for a while, I didn't like how they don't fold up very well so I added some Velcro to keep them closed. Works great and one inch or two will do.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Four handles make it easy to lift
customer_reviews.text: I bought quite a few insulated bags from Amazon but this is the best. I feel it’s better than others because of the sturdy, reinforced handles on all four sides. Very, very durable construction and the material feels thicker with quality for the price. These bags keep things cold for a few hours and it never topples over in my trunk. Also I can stack them in the cart and take my time without worrying about frozon food. Side handles are so much better to handle heavy stuff. They fold up flat and they’re washable so just perfect for grocery shopping, road trips or whatever anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: great size reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the bags. They are durable, spacious, waterproof, and well insulated to keep cold or warm food. Hold a lot for grocery or going to the beach with no problem at all with the zipper. I highly recommend this bags that it will help you get away from using disposable grocery bags. I will buy again from this seller
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Mobley

customer_reviews.title: The bag easily hold 25 plus pounds
customer_reviews.text: The product description was very accurate. Take these to Costco and load them up. The bag easily hold 25 plus pounds, straps are very sturdy, zippers high quality. Ice stays frozen in southern California heat, transported frozen food successfully.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Poor insulation. Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it. Poor insulation. Very thin. I bought because I wanted to keep my groceries cold from supermarket to my house during hot summer in florida. It doesn't hold the temperature for a long time. I paid 11.00 each and I found a cheaper 5.00 option at walmart way better than this one that really works.
customer_reviews.author: Georges V.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, Especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am a private chef and use these to transport hot/cold food to prepare on site. They are larger than I thought they would be, very sturdy I’ve even wash them in the washing machine and they’ve held up great. I’ll be buying more
customer_reviews.author: faithbomb

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food cold!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! We used them the day after we got them for grocery shopping and they kept our food (including eggs) cold for 6+ hours! I definitely recommend these, they’re great!
customer_reviews.author: Mason&Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Blew my mind! Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I started doing food delivery and needed an insulated bag. I was blessed to find this bag. It is amazing! It's black, has a zipper and has handles! I was thinking, "Can this only handle take out orders?" so I experimented. Definitely holds 5000 pieces of Legos, 1 medium sized watermelon and even bottled waters. I took it one step further and gathered all my exwife's shoes she left in my closet and put them in the bag then took the shoes to Goodwill. Kept the bag of course. This is the best purchase ever! The many uses I discovered you can do with this bag, they're pretty much giving it away. Definitely worth $1000!
customer_reviews.author: FallenAngel

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I like these bags, but they don't have handles on the side or support board for the bottom so they sag a bit when loaded with heavy things. They are well made, worth the price and they also work well as a cooler. 5 stars if they had handles and support board for the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great bags. Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: The bags are great! I ordered 4 since we normally have 8 to 12 plastic bags for every grocery trip. 4 medium work for to replace 10 plastic The only downside for me is they don't have the loops for the cashiers to secure them in the bagging area, but that's it. I'm sure I can even figure something out on my own for the loop(s) I did decide to jazz them up and mark them as ours with some iron ons I found here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Panda Bear

customer_reviews.title: NZ Home Has a Winner
customer_reviews.text: These shopping bags are sturdy, made from top quality materials and very reasonably priced. You can find shopping bags for less, but you will not find bags as good as these. Whatever you may save on cheaper bags, you will end up paying many times over in spoiled food and replacement bags. I shop once a week and load these up to the top before I put them in the back of a pickup truck for the ride home. The insulation is perfect in every season. The zippers for the top are very sturdy and ensure that everything stays in the bag and dry in rain or snow. I highly recommend these bags. Nothing I've found comes close to them.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product design needs a slight improvement. May I suggest to reinforce the handles perhaps?
customer_reviews.author: Stanza

customer_reviews.title: Zipper already broke after using a few times
customer_reviews.text: Just bought less than 30 days, used about 3 times. Really liked the capacity it could hold. Used one today, it was not fully filled and yet the zipper has already broke off one. The material is kind of flimsy so I’m not sure if it will hold up as a whole or not.
customer_reviews.author: Pacfrog

customer_reviews.title: DEPENDABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My hubby does too, especially being black. They are well made, stand up perfectly in you cart. Easy to fill up with those dairy items, frozen goodies etc. Plenty of room available, I researched the sizes and a lot of these are much smaller in the width and the length. Theses were the largest ones you had. Really work, good thick handles too. We love them, easily fit right into the trunk and then the grocery cart, awesome for the those of use who live in homes, apartments, condo's etc. Happy to recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosey.

customer_reviews.title: Tinfoil bags
customer_reviews.text: I work for doordash, ubereats and grubhub. These bags are not made to hold hot foods. I got a client complaining that the food bag was wet and I could feel it when I handed it to her. These are the type of bags that doordash would give you but less sturdier. These are thin foils and dont give you much space for a "large". If you are delivering food I would recommend wrapping the paper bags with plastic bag so the bag wont get wet. I wouldnt recommend these bags for the price. I should've paid for the bag that postmates would give rather than spending $20 on bags that did not live up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Ripped the first day I got it. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! But flimsy zippers! Good for about 4 trips to store :)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to reduce bag waste and preserve cold items on the way home from store. Love the material and insulation and handles are strong. Giving it a 1 star bc on my 4th time using it when not packed full, the zipper snapped off the tread. Kind of useless if it can’t close. I’m 2 days past the 30 day return window and used it literally 4 times. Disappointing, the 2nd bag hasn’t been used so hoping to get a month out of that one.
customer_reviews.author: STL Ace

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the worst purchases I’ve made on amazon. I didn’t use them for a couple of months and had them sitting in the backseat of my car. They completely disintegrated and left black felt all over my car and now my car is a mess. Do not buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough freezer bags
customer_reviews.text: Update: Deducted 2 stars.....First shopping experience with these bags was today. The bags did not fold down. They stayed in place once we opened them, which was great! The downfall was that one of the zippers already broke. These are our new go-to freezer bags for our weekly shopping excursions. I love how they fold easily, but at the same time, stay open when you u fold them. Our old bags would always fold back into themselves if you didn’t hold them open for the cashiers. These are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Nehlen

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: I've owned literally dozens of insulated shopping bags over the years and they all worked, but they didn't last; this set looks like they will. They are BIG, well constructed, roomy, and seem to be really sturdy. Only time will tell and a few weeks of use isn't a real guage of their longevity but they look like they have the life to make their expense worth the money. I'm disabled and have to do my shopping from an electric wheelchair and if I had a complaint it would be a personal one; I can put more groceries in one of these bags than I want to have sitting in my lap over time.
customer_reviews.author: Climber3000

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This will hold about as much groceries as 2 paper bags, while obviously being easier to hold. Zips up easily and insulates. Might be a bit heavy for some people when fully loaded, but I have no trouble (out of shape 5'5'' guy). Grocery store employees love it, I get compliments when I remember to bring it. I have no concerns about durability. I've loaded it with some pretty heavy stuff and it didn't appear to be under too much strain. I wouldn't put anything sharp in there, though. Probably tear the insulation.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jenne

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for Boxy Items
customer_reviews.text: My older freezer bag broke and I purchased this to see if it could handle the bulky items I often get at Costco. The bag's rectangular shape makes it easier to "Tetrisize" and properly fit the various boxed frozen items and not waste space like my older freezer bag (which was a more traditional pouch shape bag. These bags held the cold temperature well and kept the frozen items from defrosting quickly on our way home (even making another stop on the way home). These insulated bags work well!
customer_reviews.author: Aje_s

customer_reviews.title: Shot after 1st use.
customer_reviews.text: Back ripped across seam on dirt use and was only carrying 2 rolls of paper towels and 2 water bottles. Sewn way too close to seam edge. Worthless to me now.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo van Gorkum

customer_reviews.title: A near perfect product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These work as-expected, and are great at keeping hot items hot and cold items cold. The only issues I’ve had with these is that, depending on what’s inside them, they can be difficult to zip up and they can collapse on the sides when not fully-packed. This could’ve been fixed with a fold-down bottom, but at the price, that might be expecting a bit much. That said, at this price, this is an excellent product, and I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chalupacabra

customer_reviews.title: Great Grocery Bags
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the 2 insulated reusable grocery bags. They are a good size and seem very sturdy. I used them this week doing my weekly shopping and they were just great. I was able to get all of my cold/frozen items in the 2 bags easily with room to spare. Where I shop they have self scanners so I can scan & bag my groceries as I go, so I love using the reusable grocery bags and I especially like the insulated ones for my cold/frozen items. I would very much recommend these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Sue T

customer_reviews.title: Good quality reusable insulated grocery bags....
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a nice insulated grocery bag for refrigerated items. Only concern for this is the zipper in terms of how long it will last. I've been in touch with the seller and I've been told that they are in the process of updating the zipper in upcoming production runs. This will no doubt, improve the quality and longevity of the product. I've used these a couple of times already and I am satisfied. They fold and unfold easily, thus making it easy to use anywhere. Bottom line for me is that I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: bwdan2003

customer_reviews.title: Insulated Grocery Bags
customer_reviews.text: Even the people in the grocery stores who are filling these bags comment favorably about them. They are not listed as freezer bags, so I go to the grocery store, fill up, and come home. I practically live on frozen dinners so I use both of these every time I do my monthly grocery shopping. I do think they would keep food frozen for a couple of hours. I like the fact that they hold so much. Instead of 5 grocery bags for frozen food, I only need these two. Great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Retired Nan

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags.
customer_reviews.text: Have this in my trunk permanently. Use it almost daily to protect my trunk from restaurant leftovers, groceries like milk, ice cream,anything liquid that could spill going around corners (i wrap one of the strap handles around a "grocery hook" in the trunk). Haven't used it for cold storage while traveling long distances, so can't speak to that. But it's the perfect solution for my needs. Be aware, this is relatively thin, soft-sided, and folds up easily to tuck away when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Teresafahey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Insulated Shopping Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Very substantial item with high quality construction and materials. Just awesome for shopping; easily handles all items and keeps them cold or warm depending on what you pack it with. Easy to handle, store, and pack. Size keeps the weight of even a bag of canned goods reasonable for carrying. Took me many years to find such a right-size and durable bag. Very happy with purchase and will buy more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Chalyse

customer_reviews.title: Great price Great bags
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I've made. I recently decided to go food shopping somewhere a bit of away from me basically i have to take a train there and these bags worked very well. I bought a bunch of frozen food as well as ice cream it was about 95 degrees outside and kept everything cold by the time I got back home which was about a 25 minute train ride. They are also very sturdy as I put them in a shopping cart that I was hauling up and down stairs with.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Perez

customer_reviews.title: Work well and love these; this is my second set.
customer_reviews.text: My first set was destroyed by a cat; don't ask me why it did that, its a cat. In any case when I re-ordered there was no question what ones I wanted; if there are better bags out there I don't know of them, because these work fine for what I need and I was happy to order replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight bag
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey for an insulated grocery bag (2 for 19.99) , but if SQUARE is what you need, this bag is for you. However these bags are a bit lightweight. Sam's Club has insulated bags (look in the frozen department) that are MUCH more heavy duty and will hold about the same amount of frozen items. For lightweight duty these were acceptable, but for repeated heavy duty use, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: A. Calabrese

customer_reviews.title: The best grocery bag available
customer_reviews.text: Insulated with foil type lining...very durable material. Generous size. Zippers. Holds a great deal and handles sturdy. Had similarly designed bags YEARS ago. Hauled them in suitcase when traveling to have suitable bag with protection from heat or cold. Lasted like iron...still have after 10 years. Folds flat. Will hold about equivalent of 2 large paper grocery bags but no leakage. Great for ice cream transport (25 miles) in warm weather. Unobtrusive black.
customer_reviews.author: northwyndy

customer_reviews.title: Six months later and they're still in perfect shape!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write a review simply to allow time to use the bags regularly. I love them! Picked up a bunch to put into multiple family members' cars, and they're all wearing equally well. The zipper can catch once in awhile on the corner of the bag, but no big deal. They are sturdy, stand up while being packed, keep things cooler for the ride home, and don't show dirt. Oh, and I regularly pack one or more with several gallons of milk or multiple bottles of juice, and despite them being heavy, the seams have held up without issue; handle seams as well as bottom seams. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: It has multiple uses and keeps its form
customer_reviews.text: I have tested it out and this is a great bag. Folds down nice and compact. Just the right size for my use. Update. These bags are so useful, They do not retain any smells and I use it for both food and carrying things from car to home. You can put A LOT in the bag and bag retains a neat and firm shape. Not just for food but for groceries and anything else non-food related. Great bags with multiple uses. Update August 2020. I bought 2 dishes of take-out food (hot) in another city and placed inside bag, 7 hours later after arriving home, the food was still warm. Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUserFromCanada123

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking to the store
customer_reviews.text: Milk used to only last a few days beause of the intense heat it would get from the walk from the grocey store to my apartment. Now the milk stays cold and survives the journey. Also carrying things in this grocery bags are sooo much easier than in plastic bags. You can also feel better about yourself by not wasting more plastic. I have used the bags for many trips now and it still seems to be holding up well
customer_reviews.author: Tiusty

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are amazing. They're so big I don't usually need to use more than 1, the longest I've used them is for 3 hours and everything stayed cold/frozen. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk
customer_reviews.text: Literally fell apart from the rigorous activity of sitting in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Yamashita

customer_reviews.title: grocery bags
customer_reviews.text: very nice insulated bags; I have several stops to make and no air conditioner in the car , makes it difficult given i am in central Florida. i bought these bags to replace a larger bag that didn't last. the interior of these new bags seem more durable and well made. i like that they stand straight to fill them easier and no tipping over when i drive, the food stays nice and cold. the handles are a perfect length and sturdy. This company has been so terrific, checking in to be sure i am happy with the purchase so great price great quality and great company what more can you ask for ? :-)
customer_reviews.author: sun angel

customer_reviews.title: Work as intended
customer_reviews.text: We live in the country so usually only go to town on a big grocery run 1-2x a month. We’ve used these now a couple of times and are very happy with them. With the drive, we stuff the cooler bags as full as possible to help food stay cold. I have packed these FULL. They were heavy and they do just fine. Food kept cold for over an hour. I plan on ordering more in the future. We keep these stored in the vehicle just in case. Worked out very handy to keep a pizza and buffalo wing supper warm on the drive home.
customer_reviews.author: aealbin

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: These are better made than expected for the price, large enough to hold large primal cuts of meat and well insulated. We often purchase meat at wholesale clubs and these keep the meat cold and frozen foods frozen for several hours. These will hold more weight than you really want to carry. Zipper closure is solid. I would, without hesitation rerecommend this product to a friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: Navyvette

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bag for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Better insulation and construction than standard issue Door Dasher bag. I bought these to help organize my stacked delivery orders. They keep food roasty toasty and save time. I'm not handling the orders multiple times before delivery. Time is money and so is well insulated food delivered in timely fashion. Lightweight and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: budget ear

customer_reviews.title: Great for shopping
customer_reviews.text: These bags are easy to fold and easy to use. Very roomy. I like using them for my milk and other cold or frozen items when shopping. One bagging associate even asked me where I got them. They appreciated how they stay upright and open when putting groceries in them. I've used them about 8 times so far and no complaints. I've also used them to take food places as well. They aren't cute like woven baskets for a picnic but the benefit is that they are lightly insulated and roomy with better handles :)
customer_reviews.author: FL LP

customer_reviews.title: good for short trips
customer_reviews.text: these have worked well for my use. only using them to pick up and deliver for food service. they're easy to open and close. they keep the heat in, or out, depending on circumstances. added bonus... the stinky food doesn't leak odors into the vehicle. for short trips in the car these work well.
customer_reviews.author: TRcantSee

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to haul my lunches to work, groceries, and even stick my crockpots inside to carry in when I have potlucks at work. I love how big and spacious it is but not entirely huge. Extremely convenient to have on hand. I have also taken this with me on road trips to haul food. Very sturdy! I was skeptical at first if it was going to rip on me with I stuck a 5 quart cooker inside and carried by the handles. Handles and bag were hefty! I use this on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Imogene

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it four stars is because the handles don’t stay down when the bag is being used, forcing one to hold the handles down with one hand while loading and unloading with the other. A minor inconvenience given that the bag itself is sturdy, holds a lot of items, and zips up securely. I’ve filled it to capacity and have seen no evidence of wear and tear. I use it constantly. There is a small pocket in which I store my car keys, shopping list, receipt, etc.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rhea

customer_reviews.title: I'll be buying more.
customer_reviews.text: I bought then for frozen and cold items but I'll buy more for all of my groceries. They are easier to use than cloth or plastic bags. My local stores have mostly you bag checkouts. When they do have baggers, they are often less than competent. These are sturdy enough that I can probably put all of my groceries in 4 of them. The zipper top is great to keep the cold in and hold the shape to keep from crushing items like bread. The straps make them easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Don B

customer_reviews.title: For quick fast usage
customer_reviews.text: It’s roomy enough to carry 6 medium pizzas, but if you are running errands and will use this more than 20 min then it’s not that great. If your doing a quick pick up and will get home immediately then yes it’s a great bag to have to keep your food warm. I purchased because I do food deliveries, I tested on my own personal time and had unexpected errand to run, after picking up the pizza and 30 min later my food was cold as if it wasn’t in an insulated bag. I recommend for quick fast pick up but not if your running errands and need to keep food warm. Didn’t test with cold items.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bags to give as Mother's Day gifts at church. I first ordered only 2 bags to see what they looked like and was very pleased. A local print shop is going to put our logo on them, and they said there was no problem doing that (I was concerned the fabric texture would not be suitable for printing). Great bags and I highly recommend them. I folded one up and put it under the seat of my truck so it will always be handy.
customer_reviews.author: bjcj7422

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I like how roomy the bags are, but after one use the seams are coming loose on the top. The zippers are very cheap, it's only a matter of a couple more uses and they will break
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Delivery bag envy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bags, large. It has a thin thermal layer but it's not a strong or sturdy enough structure to for instance carry drinks. A Doordasher had delivery bag envy over how spacious and nice looking the bag is, apparently the company bag doesn't even compare. GrubHub bags is definitely a step up and much more sturdy and functional, could probably stand a drink inside. But for the price point, there are a nice option.
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: Relief in times of emergency, great product
customer_reviews.text: Such a simple design, so easily tucked in the back of my car. But the true worth came today when a friend had experienced a home fire and we had a limited time to empty refrig and freezer for transfer. I live 30 minutes from my friends but the freezer items were still solid and even the fresh veggies were in good shape. It was such a stress relief to them. Thanks for helping me be helpful!
customer_reviews.author: jane l hill

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you work on food delivery platforms
customer_reviews.text: If your working for a food delivery platform (Uber eats, doordash, etc) it's a must you have your customer food in a insulated bag. Your tips WILL increase. The only thing I hate about the bag is that sometimes it is a struggle to get the zippers around the corners of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Authentic M

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food frozen
customer_reviews.text: At curbside, I have the store load all frozen & dairy in these bags. I like how these are wide and not deep. The zippers could be a better quality. They get a bit stuck in the corners but still okay. Once a worker put a ready made salad sideways. I got bag inside at home and found the juice leaked into the bag, thru the seam and onto my floor all over. Some guys just dont know how to pack food.
customer_reviews.author: TrudyO

customer_reviews.title: Large insulated grocery bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags hold plenty of groceries and are insulated. We have not had them long enough to be able to comment on durability. They fold easily and the handles seem to be sturdy. We have had problems with handles on some of the freebie bags (given out at fairs, etc) so looked carefully at these handles which appear to be well-reinforced. I don't know how well the insulation will work in the summer as the weather is still pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie Gebhart

customer_reviews.title: Would not put heavy items in this bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to transport my frozen items from store to home in a hot climate. I didn’t see double zippers like a few have mentioned but the handles and zipper seem well constructed. This large size bag will be easier to transport into the house than the plastic grocery bags from the store. I don’t think I would put heavy items in these bags but that’s not why I purchased. Content with the two bags.
customer_reviews.author: Laverne C

customer_reviews.title: Except for the zipper, I like the bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag's size, sturdiness, and the flat bottom. The flat bottom makes it easier to put items in the bag. The XL size and sturdiness allows me to use the bag to haul large items that would break my old bags. My only complaint is the zipper. Although I do not use the zipper, one end has fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Huber Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but one zipper broke 2nd time used
customer_reviews.text: I am in Instacart shopper and these were recommended for grocery delivery. I do like them, they are roomy and can hold 2 paper or plastic bags of cold items for delivery. Keeps cold stuff cold or Hot stuff hot... Just be careful with the Zippers...there are 2 one on each side and they can zip to the center of the bag, but one side broke 2nd time used. No worry, the other one still works. I still would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Watts

customer_reviews.title: Great shopping bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, insulated, reinforced bottom & it zips so the food remains cold or hot. I love these bags because I am disabled & the handles hook on my walker making it easier for me to transfer. My son saw these bags & I ordered more for him.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These insulated bags do as advertised....good size for grocery shopping, fold up easily and pack away in a flat manor for reduced storage space and does keep food cold/frozen until I arrived home from shopping. These are great for weekly shopping trips as they are intended to be used. I would not use them for an extended period of time,say for a weekend camping trip. That's what coolers are for!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kubisch

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I've used and wore out so many cheap bags. Got a nice Amazon gift card for Christmas and decided I was going to try these totes. Used them immediately and was happy to see how much product they held. The bags are lightweight enough but sturdy to hold quite a bit of grocery. The inside insolation liner will help keep your food either cold or hot. Nice, sturdy handles. The square design helps the bag stay upright during transit.
customer_reviews.author: Super shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good, not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, affordable, and hold a lot. The thing I missed, though, was that they do not have long, over-the-shoulder straps, which make them slightly less useful for groceries, both for lifting them out of the cart, and for carrying them into the house along with all the other bags. But other than that, they're good.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Wardwell

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC BAG... GREAT DESIGN !!!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT product and features in all ways. Have nothing bad to say about my order. I was actually surprised at the superior quality and durability of the bags. It exceeded my expectations. Very true to description on Amazon. Followup messages by NZ were great and product delivered on time (even coming from 2 locations within the company!) Would highly recommend this product; worth every penny. These bags will last a long time and can be used in many ways. Thanks NZ ! ...(and Amazon) ! ::))))) Best, Ellen
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: The bag makes short work of grocery orders. I use it non-stop and it puts up well with the demand placed on it. It works so well I now use it for work as well as home use. The straps to carry it feel very sturdy and it has a handle on each side to give you different options on how to carry it. For orders which are exceptionally heavy I use all for bundled up and it still held up (3x 30lb cat litter bags, very heavy but the 4 straps together made it work in one trip instead of 3 up and down stairs. Not recommended to always go that heavy but it works in a pinch)
customer_reviews.author: Brenden S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but one was defective
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a couple months for food delivery and it insulates well. The problem I had was one of the bags had a manufacturing error where a section of the zipper teeth was missing so the zipper pulled right off. (see image) Customer service was quick and efficient, refunding me 50% of the price to compensate for the defective bag. I only really need one bag most of the time and the second bag can still be partially zipped and used to hold food in the car. Despite one being defective, I still give it 3 stars because of the good customer service and the other bag working well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome zipper and reinforced all around!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome reusable grocery bags! Perfect height for wine bottles, big size coke and milk! Keeps everything cold so I don’t have to rush home after shopping. :) I used these bags for a beach trip and my takeout containers fit just right and kept my drinks cold for about 3 hours. Absolutely happy with the purchase and I highly recommend these to anybody looking for some great quality insulated bags.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke at second use.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and usefulness. Was very unhappy when the zipper broke at second use.
customer_reviews.author: Lenora Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Battle tested and housewife approved
customer_reviews.text: These bags are perfect for the purpose that I am using them for which is one of those grocery/food services. Honestly from first glance they looked very thin and made me think they weren't going to last but it's the complete opposite. Fits a ton of stuff and even tho it can get heavy the straps are durable and these bags have been working perfect for me. I pop a few ice packs and frozen water bottles and it keeps the refrigerated/frozen foods nicely cold and fresh. They fold up easily and are very easy to clean. I'm actually going to purchase another set. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: animefan88tv

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to get away from plastic bags for a while now and decided to try the NZ Home bags. As a lot of us I live in a suburban area and a most grocery shopping is not exactly close so I wanted something to keep cold/cool stuff safe until I get home. These bags work great! I can keep them folded and stored in my car until needed so they are always handy. And I really like the fact they are washable to keep the nasty stuff at bay.
customer_reviews.author: James Hays

customer_reviews.title: It Kept an Ice-Cream Cake Frozen for 3 Hours!
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended to this product from a co-owner at an ice-cream shop that specialized in ice-cream cake. In the search of an insulated bag, I needed something that would keep an ice-cream cake frozen and solid for a 3 hour commute. I was warned that it may melt (while including ice packs on the ice-cream cake) by the end of my commute. After my 3 hour commute, the ice-cream cake managed to survive and it was still solid! Very satisfied in this product and I hope to use it more often!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L

customer_reviews.title: Great for Food Delivery, Groceries
customer_reviews.text: I use this to deliver food, but I wish there was like a solid bottom tray that was provided so drinks and heavy food items would stay in place like the ones that Doordash provides you for the bottom of their food bag. Anything heavy will sink like a plastic bag, but it’s great overall for delivering food items that are small like a burrito or taco or burger
customer_reviews.author: kyung

customer_reviews.title: Best delivery bags for hot and cold
customer_reviews.text: I deliver food as my job. Getting hot streaming food to them is always my goal. I deliver like I was delivering to myself. The ice cream in a 90 or above car in humid Cincinnati Oh. to stay cold where the coldness radiates when you open the bag. Well these are those bags. 5 stars is not enough. 10 for price, quality, and complinents from other delivery drivers. You can even use these for grociers and ext. I rarely leave reviews but I really do love these bags. Thr size is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Julia nappi

customer_reviews.title: Great idea - poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for Instacart and Postmates deliveries. Product folds flat and is quite lightweight. Sadly the zippers on both of mine are very rough and get caught all the time when try to zip them up, especially around the corners. After 6 days of use one of the bags tore a seam at the zipper down one complete side making it basically useless for temperature control deliveries. I will keep using the torn one as a backup for non-thermal deliveries but that defeats the purpose of buying thermal bags. I’ll stick to my cheap Ozark Trails Walmart thermal bags which are bulkier but much sturdier and whose zipper only goes down one seam.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: so far so good..
customer_reviews.text: only extended use will tell how durable they are. in the mean time even the clerks at my local grocery wanted know where to find them so they could get some for their own use. after having the chap bags carry straps pull off with a minimal load, these bags with the straps that go clear around the bottom are not only logical but needed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Steelquist

customer_reviews.title: Handy for UberEats and Postmates!
customer_reviews.text: I drive for UberEats and Postmates and these are lifesavers! The foods are kept fresher and remain their proper temperatures. I also use these for groceries. When I am done driving for these companies, I will be buying more for my personal use! I recommend these for everyone but especially delivery drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Guy

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my trip to Washington to carry our cold food from hotel to hotel
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect, folded up small enough to put in my carry on luggage and kept food cold from the grocery store until we reached our hotel. We froze water bottles (so ice wouldn't melt in the cooler) to keep in the cooler when we switched to a different hotel every 2 days. The food stayed cold, even ice cream stayed somewhat frozen (soft serve consistency) for an hour and a half. One XL bag held a lot of food. Would highly recommend for anyone traveling between hotels or airbnb's.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Bags are very roomy and keep my items cold for a while. It’s great because my favorite grocery store is now 30 minutes away from my home. I no longer have to worry about my cold items staying at a safe temperature. To give an idea how much these bags hold, I moved across town and one of these bags was large enough to hold my entire freezer full of items. I needed probably two for my refrigerator which was very full. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Candace McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to carry fish from Barbados to Orlando . Travelled all day, arriving home after 11 pm. Believe or not the fish was still frozen considering the fact the I placed the fish in container at 8 pm before going to the airport the next day. I was impressed with the ability of his product to keep thing cold. I have two bags so I don't need to buy another. I had no problems or leaking or any such like. Its kinda light but it is does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon H. Small

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Insulated Grocery Bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bags to replace several I had bought at a local grocery store. I was pleasantly surprised at how sturdy these bags are and the size is just right....not too big so they get really heavy and not too small where they don't hold everything. I believe I bought the medium size bags. I would definitely recommend these and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: mrsh

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags.
customer_reviews.text: They make toting my groceries so much easier. Good quality and easy carry. Especially like that they keep my frozen groceries cool and that they zip up easily. Good quality all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: A. Derifield

customer_reviews.title: So much space
customer_reviews.text: These bags are amazing. They can hold a lot of items and are strong enough to do it. The only flaw is the zipper being a cheap plastic. You must zip carefully or it will break.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sturdy bags. As an Uber Eats Driver it helps keeps my customers food at the ight temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Shaine

customer_reviews.title: ROOMY AND STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Since NY has banned one time use plastic bags, we have changed over to multi-use bags. It's only been about a month, but so far these have been great. Of course we aren't shopping that much either with the covid 19 issue.
customer_reviews.author: starlady1190

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought both sets of XL and Medium. These are wonderful to take into the grocery stores. Using the insulated grocery bags, this way I know my frozen and refrigerated items will be safe on the trip home. I'll probably buy another set of size medium just for regular groceries. The XL is the size I would take into Costco. Very satisfied with the quality and sturdiness of these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Avenue-7

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great as a cooler substitute and worked great with dry ice
customer_reviews.text: I went on a camping trip for 3 days. I had very minimal space in the car and decided to use two of these bags for frozen food and beer. I used one to keep meat and fruit ice cold. If you are a dry ice kind of person, this will work wonderfully, just put newspaper to separate dry ice from touching food. If you are an ice kind of person, this bag won’t leak either. It’s wierdly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected :(
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item thinking this was a pack of 2 and only one bag was delivered. I use delivery insulation bags for work that are bright red and great but wanted black bags that were less bright and more lowkey. I thought this looked like a good deal but only one bag was delivered and it's very flimsy. I probably will not use this for work. Sorry for the bad review but it's just not what I was hoping for! Probably perfect for someone else! I have already returned the item and am hoping to still find a sturdy black insulation bag for big catering orders for work!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerated grocery bags
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this product. I've had other similar bags and they didn't compare to these. These are very well-constructed and hold a great deal of groceries. The bags themselves are not heavy so don't add a lot of weight when they are full of groceries. Easy to store and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: PPM

customer_reviews.title: We have owned for about 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong. We love these bags. They fit ALOT of groceries Keeps em cold
customer_reviews.author: Selbelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Cold/frozen
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my car. Every time I go to grocery store all my cold/frozen items go in it. I also used it to keep 3 frozen pies frozen for 2 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to store. I keep in my trunk.
customer_reviews.text: In this day where most stores are no longer using plastic bags, this is a great option. It is not as bulky as most thermal bags but still sturdy enough to hold groceries. Keep in mind its not a bulletproof bag, but with common sense car it should last quite awhile and if planning on leaving the groceries in the hot car for a while, throw a couple of ice packs and you are good to go. It fits the bill for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D Yip

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these affordable, totable insulated bags!
customer_reviews.text: Great size with choices for handles. It keeps its shape and keeps drinks cold. I haven’t tried hot dishes or drinks yet. These bags were just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hardy

customer_reviews.title: The are very nice insulated shopping bags, right sized and priced.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these insulated shopping bags for multiple uses during the week for grocery trips and other uses. They are a perfect size for my needs. They fit in the back of my SUV well and are sturdy and well made. I got my order quickly and as promised. The price was right and I will be purchasing more of these for gifts for friends and family. Eugene A. Bennett
customer_reviews.author: Eugene A. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Helps me with my job!
customer_reviews.text: I have begun delivering groceries as a part time gig and this is PERFECT for them. Not only does it keep them cold, but it allows me to put multiple grocery bags in it so that I have more space on my arms to hold my phone, keys, etc. The only thing I would say needs work is the bottom... I think it needs to be more sturdier. I have put some cardboard in it for more support, but this product would really be the best if it was just a little more studier. All in all, great product and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Nice product - insulated well
customer_reviews.text: I like how much I could fit in it and how compact it is folded up and stored. The only thing for me personally is the walls were so flexible it was often difficult to keep balanced and had to prop items around it to stand straight. All in all - very nice product and seems to be rugged.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dunkin

customer_reviews.title: Bad zippers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I started working with Shipt and instacart. They do not zip up very easily, zipper gets stuck around the corners.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: These NZ Insulated Grocery Bags are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these insulated grocery bags to replace our current ones that are falling apart. These new ones appear to be more durable, have a double zipper to make them easier to open and close and work extremely well to keep food fresh, especially during the warmer months. We were very happy with this purchase and with this company.
customer_reviews.author: buffettfan

customer_reviews.title: That they are strong
customer_reviews.text: Love my bags I purchased 2 bags. My supermarket is about 15 miles from my house so I like that my cold items stay cold. I have used the bag for heavy thing and the handles are very strong. I had my for about 6 months or so still look like new. Oh and the zippers are strong as well and are still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Ann b

customer_reviews.title: Great got/cold storage
customer_reviews.text: Good sized hot/cold totes and you get two of them. They work great for food delivery for Uber Eats. I am sure my customers appreciate that their food stays hot or cold. Will probably buy a smaller size and look for one that can be used for pizzas. I would definitely recommend these to others. Could be used for groceries as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my order!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the order and liked even better after a few adjustments. I am using this in my back basket on a mobility scooter. I didn't like how I would put things in the basket behind my seat and everyone could see through the basket. This bag fit perfectly and I added a black cardboard to the bottom and added Velcro to the sides to keep them up. I now have a bag that is fitted and has a zip top to keep my items covered. My husband and I use the scooter at swap meets. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene LeGrande

product_meta.title: NZ Home XL Insulated Shopping Bags for Groceries or Food Delivery, Sturdy Zipper, Foldable, Washable, Heavy Duty, Stands Upright, Completely Reinforced Bottom (2 Pack, Black)
feature_bullets: Capacity - 16W x 13H x 9D Suitable For Larger Items Or Multiple Small Items
Durable - Refined Dual Slider Zipper And Reinforced 'No Tear' Handles
Practical - Perfect Pair Of Shopping Bags For Women Or For Men

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,950 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
